text: what you think about save the children donation ?
I think it is a genuine organization who uses it's fundraising donations in the right way.
you dont think anything bad is happening with this donation?
No I think they use most of their donations to actually help children. Do you believe they don't?
i really dont have a real opinion , but the world is dirty and everybody cheat.
I think there are a lot of safeguards in organizations like this one that is set up to prevent such a thing.
so you think to trust this organisation and help the children with donating in the future?
Yes, for sure. I think they are a trustworthy organization.
did they ever did a big mistake that was all over the news?
I am not aware of that. In fact, I believe they were a top-rated children's charity the last couple years.
did they collect a lot of money for the children's?
I am pretty sure they do. Like me, I think people donate to more children's charities than anything else.
i always thought that the money goes for other things and not the children , but i am spectral about this.
Well it takes personnel and resources to run any organization so I'm sure some of the money goes to that but I suspect more goes to the children.
things must be always clear to the public eyes .
True, especially if you take part in donating. However, I usually just give where I feel I need to and if people use it the wrong way, I believe they will get what's coming to them.
if what you say i true i agree with you completely.
Maybe it is a blind trust but there's really no way to know for sure if they use the money correctly unless you are the person handling the money.
blind trust it is. But i know for sure that they help a lot of children, the question is can they do more with that amount of money?
Well I'm sure there is always more that can be done. I just feel that if they help a few children get a better childhood then it is worth it. Children are our future.
